name: Two bullets (xlef)
description:
Defeat the zombies with two bullets!
Made for the Unite Game Jam. It is the first game jam I ever participated and I am not very experienced in game development, only kinda experienced with general programming.

Assets used:

  • https://retrocademedia.itch.io/buttonprompts4
  • https://canarigames.itch.io/canaripack-8bit-topdown
  • https://www.dafont.com/vcr-osd-mono.font
